DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy investigational product treatment knee Osteoarthritis . Half participant receive medical chitosan , half receive sodium hyaluronate .
DOC.brief_title: Medical Chitosan Sodium Hyaluronate Knee Osteoarthritis ( CHOOSE )
DOC.detailed_description: Medical chitosan sodium hyaluronate form reticular layer cover joint surface , alleviate joint friction pain . For medical chitosan , half-life long sodium hyaluronate , interval time intra-articular injection longer .
